CustomField.formula: IF ( Orders_customer__c = true, 0, IF(Orders_last_year_rolling__c = 0, 0, MAX(1 - (Implied_Average_Basket__c / Median_Basket_converted__c), MIN (IF(Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c = 0, 0, IF((Account__r.zz_Transaction_volume_protections_p__c / Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c / Orders_last_year_rolling__c) > 0.25, Orders_last_year_rolling__c * Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c / Account__r.zz_expected_turnover__c - 1, 0)), 1), 0)))
CustomField.label: Lift probability
